GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22565: sa prācīṃ diśam anu vy acalat /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22567: bṛhataś ca vai sa rathantarasya ca viśveṣāṃ ca devānām
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22568: ādityānāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22569: bṛhate ca vai sa rathantarāya ca viśvebhyaś ca devebhya ādityebhyaś ca-
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22570: -ā vṛścate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati // PS_18,28.1
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22573: vāso 'har uṣṇīṣaṃ rātrī keśā haritau pravartau kalmalir maṇiḥ /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22574: bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22575: pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22576: kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarāv ainaṃ kīrtir gacchaty
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22577: ainaṃ yaśo gacchati ya evaṃ veda // PS_18,28.2
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22578: sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśam anu vy acalat /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22579: taṃ yajñāyāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ ca yajñaś ca paśavaś cānu vy acalan /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22581: yajñāyāyajñiyāya ca vai sa vāmadevyāya ca yajñāya ca paśubhyaś ca (…) // PS_18,28.3
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22584: aho rātrī ca pariṣkandau (…) // see 2d PS_18,28.4
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22586: taṃ vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ ca varuṇaś ca rājā paścānu vy acalan /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22591: paurṇamāsī cāmāvāsyā ca pariṣkandau (…) // see 2d PS_18,28.6
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22592: sa udīcīṃ diśam anu vy acalat /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22594: śyaitasya ca vai sa naudhasasya ca somasya ca rājñaḥ
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22595: sapta ṛṣīnāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ veda) /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22601: śrutaṃ ca viśrutaṃ ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22610: pūrvau pādav āstāṃ varṣāś ca śarac cāparau /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22617: devajanāḥ pariṣkandā apsarasaḥ patnīr viśvāni bhūtāny upasadaḥ /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22619: priyo viśveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // PS_18,29.1 (29)

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22673: sa dhruvān diśam anu vy acalat /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22677: vīrudhāṃ ca vānaspatyānāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ veda) /

GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22680: ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati // PS_18,32.1
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22682: tam ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca sūryaś ca candramāś cānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22683: ṛtasya ca vai sa satyasya ca sūryasya ca candramāsaś ca (…) /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22684: ṛtāya ca vai sa satyāya ca sūryāya ca candramāse ca (…) // see 1gh PS_18,32.2
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22686: tam ṛcaś ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma cānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22687: ṛcāṃ ca vai sa sāmnāṃ ca yajuṣāṃ ca brahmaṇaś ca (priyaṃ dhāma …) /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22688: ṛgbhyaś ca vai sa sāmabhyaś ca yajurbhyaś ca brahmaṇe ca (…) // see 1gh PS_18,32.3
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22690: tam itihāsaś ca purāṇaṃ ca gāthāś ca nārāśaṃsīścānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22691: itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānāṃ ca nārāśaṃsīnāṃ ca (priyaṃ …) /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22692: itihāsāya ca vai sa purāṇāya ca gāthābhyaś ca nārāśaṃsībhyaś ca (…) // see 1gh PS_18,32.4
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22693: sa paramāṃ diśam anu vy acalat /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22694: tam ṛtavaś cārtavāś ca lokāś ca laukyāś cānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22695: ṛtūnāṃ ca vai sa ārtavānāṃ ca lokānāṃ ca laukyānāṃ ca priyaṃ (dhāma …) /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22696: ṛtubhyaś ca vai sa ārtavebhyaś ca lokebhyaś ca laukyaibhyaś cā vṛścate (ya …) // PS_18,32.5
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22697: sokadrīcīṃ diśam anu vy acalat tato nāvartsyannamanyata /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22698: taṃ virāḍ anu vy acalat sarve ca devāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22699: virāje ca vai sa sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca priyaṃ (…) /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22700: virāje ca vai sa sarvebhyaś ca devebhyaḥ sarvābhyaś ca devatābhya ā vṛścate (ya …) // PS_18,32.6
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22701: so 'nādiṣṭāṃ diśam anu vy acalat tato nāvartsyannamanyata /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22702: taṃ dakṣiṇāgniś ca gārhapatyaś cāhavanīyaś ca yajñaś ca yajamānaś cānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22703: dakṣiṇāgneś ca vai sa gārhapatyasya cāhavanīyasya yajñasya yajamānasya ca priyaṃ (dhāma …) /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22704: dakṣiṇāgnaye ca vai sa gārhapatyāya cāhavanīyāya ca yajñāya ca yajamanāya cā vṛścate (ya …) // PS_18,32.7
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22706: taṃ ditiś caditiś ceḍā cendraṇī cānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22707: diteś ca vai so 'diteś ceḍāyāś cendrāṇyāś ca (priyaṃ …) /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22708: ditaye ca vai so 'ditaye ceḍāyai cendrānyai cā (vṛścate …) // PS_18,32.8
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22710: taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaś cānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22711: prajāpateś ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaś ca pituś ca pitāmahasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22713: prajāpataye ca vai sa parameṣṭhine ca pitre ca pitāmahāya cā vṛścate
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22714: ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati // PS_18,32.9 (32)
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22716: sa mahimā sadrur bhūtvāntaṃ bhūmyā agacchat samudro 'bhavat /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22717: taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī cāpaś ca śraddhā ca varṣaṃ ca bhūtvānu vy avartanta /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22718: taṃ yajñaś ca lokaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca bhūtvābhi pary ā vartanta /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22719: ainam āpo gacchanty ainaṃ varṣaṃ gacchaty ainaṃ śraddhā gacchaty
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22720: ainaṃ dīkṣā gacchaty ainaṃ yajño gacchaty ainaṃ loko gacchaty
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22721: ainam annaṃ gacchaty ainam annādyaṃ gacchati ya (evaṃ veda) // PS_18,33.1 (33)
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22723: sa viśaḥ sabandhūn annaṃ cānnādyaṃ cābhy ud atiṣṭhata /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22724: viśāṃ ca vai sa sabandhūnāṃ cānnasya cānnādyasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22726: viḍbhyaś ca vai sa sabandhubhyaś cānnāya cānnādyāya cā vṛścate
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22727: ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati // PS_18,34.1 (34)
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22729: taṃ sabhā ca samitiś ca senā ca surā cānu vy acalan /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22730: sabhāyāś ca vai sa samiteś ca senāyāś ca sūrāyāś ca sa priyaṃ
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22732: sabhāyai ca vai sa samitaye ca senāyai ca surāyai cā vṛścate
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22735: yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo rājño 'tithir gṛham āgacchet /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22736: śreyāṃsam enam ātmano mānayet tathā rāṣṭrāya nā vṛścate
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22737: tathā kṣatrāya nā vṛścate tathā brahmaṇe nā vṛścate /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22738: tato vai brahma ca kṣatraṃ cod atiṣṭhatāṃ
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22740: te prajāpatir abravīd bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram iti /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22741: tato vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22742: iyaṃ vāva bhūmir bṛhaspatir asau dyaur indraḥ /
GV00sa_paippalAdasaMhitA:22744: ainaṃ kṣatraṃ gacchatīndrayāvī bhavati ya ādityaṃ kṣatraṃ divam indraṃ veda /
